title: Top selling Nintendo DS games worldwide in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month New Super Mario Bros. has the highest Sales in million units and Super Mario 64 DS has the lowest Sales in million units.
The highest Month New Super Mario Bros. has 19.74 more Sales in million units than the lowest Month Super Mario 64 DS.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
Month New Super Mario Bros. has the highest Sales in million units and Super Mario 64 DS has the lowest Sales in million units.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month New Super Mario Bros. has the highest Sales in million units and Super Mario 64 DS has the lowest Sales in million units.
The highest Month New Super Mario Bros. has 19.74 more Sales in million units than the lowest Month Super Mario 64 DS.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The Sales in million units is appeared to be the highest at Month New Super Mario Bros. and lowest at Month Super Mario 64 DS.
The second highest Sales in million units is appeared to be the Month Nintendogs.
The lowest value at Month Super Mario 64 DS is 2.78x times less than the highest value at New Super Mario Bros..
The Month New Super Mario Bros. has the highest Sales in million units, followed by Nintendogs, and Mario Kart DS. Down to the Month Super Mario 64 DS which is the lowest.
Over the past 10 Months, the Sales in million units has declined.
The average Sales in million units in all 10 Months is 18.11.
The Sales in million units is 181.09 if we add up values of all Months.
